list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a game played with cues on a billiard table in which the players use a cue ball (white) to pocket the other balls (fifteen red and six colored) in a set order.
subject (oneself or one's opponent) to a snooker.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he potted yellow and green, and then snookered Davis on the brown
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh trong chậu vàng và xanh, rồi snookered davis trên màu nâu
